TopicTitle: Parts rearrange in VAB when rotating assemblies

Articles.Content: My lander was good, placed in cargo bay. Copied with ALt-click. Rotated copied assembly 180 to attached to other end of cargo bay (so should have 2 landers in cargo bay) - what resulted was all the parts ended up in different orientation eg: engines were upside down compared to rest of rotated craft and power cells in completely different orientation but also wrong.
I have had bugs like this a few times.  Some glitch in the mirroring system - it made making rovers quite difficult
